笑.definition: to laugh; to smile; to laugh at

笑場.definition: (of an actor) to break character by laughing; to corpse

笑容可掬.definition: smiling wholeheartedly (idiom); beaming from ear to ear

笑掉大牙.definition: to laugh one's head off; ridiculous; jaw-dropping

笑料.definition: comedic material; (in reference to a person) laughingstock; butt of jokes

笑林.definition: Jokes (title of an ancient collection of jokes, often used in the title of modern collections of jokes)

笑柄.definition: a matter for ridicule; an object of ridicule; laughingstock

笑罵.definition: to deride; to mock; (jocular) to heckle good-naturedly; to razz

笑臉兒.definition: erhua variant of 笑臉|笑脸[xiao4 lian3]

笑臉相迎.definition: to welcome sb with a smiling face (idiom)

笑裡藏刀.definition: lit. a dagger hidden in smiles (idiom); friendly manners belying hypocritical intentions; when the fox preaches, look to the geese

笑話.definition: joke; jest (CL:個|个[ge4]); to laugh at; to mock; ridiculous; absurd

笑話兒.definition: erhua variant of 笑話|笑话[xiao4 hua5]

笑談.definition: object of ridicule; laughingstock; to laugh over sth; to make light chat

笑貧不笑娼.definition: the notion in society that it's better to get ahead in the world by abandoning one's scruples than to suffer poverty; lit. despising poverty but not prostitution (idiom)

笑逐顏開.definition: smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure; all smiles; joy written across one's face

笑面虎.definition: man with a big smile and evil intentions

笑鷗.definition: (bird species of China) laughing gull (Leucophaeus atricilla)

笑點.definition: funny bits; humorous parts; jokes; punchline

笑點低.definition: amused by even the weakest joke; ready to laugh at the smallest thing
